meanings.definition: Able to use both hands equally well.
meanings.sent1: She is ambidextrous and can write with both hands.
meanings.sent2: The ambidextrous artist painted a masterpiece using both hands.
meanings.sent3: The ambidextrous chef effortlessly chopped vegetables with either hand.
meanings.sent4: His ambidextrous skills in basketball made him a valuable player on the court.
meanings.sent5: The magician's ambidextrous performance left the audience in awe.

meanings.definition: Capable of using both hands with equal skill.
meanings.sent1: Being ambidextrous, he could play the guitar and piano simultaneously.
meanings.sent2: The ambidextrous surgeon performed the surgery flawlessly with both hands.
meanings.sent3: The ambidextrous juggler amazed the crowd by juggling with both hands at once.
meanings.sent4: Her ambidextrous typing speed was unmatched in the office.
meanings.sent5: The ambidextrous archer hit the bullseye with precision using either hand.

meanings.sent1: The ambidextrous musician played the piano and drums effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: He was known for his ambidextrous drawing abilities in art class.
meanings.sent3: The ambidextrous tailor sewed the dress with finesse using both hands.
meanings.sent4: Her ambidextrous coordination in sports made her a versatile athlete.
meanings.sent5: The ambidextrous sculptor crafted a masterpiece with equal dexterity in each hand.
